name: Jacob's Games 2022!
description:
run from sussy baka imposter, Neb the slender dude will chase you forever... 

There are two games you can play:

the amongus game or the neb game:

The neb game is where you are send to this abandon factory that has been over run by slender nebs, you mission is to kill as much as you can but at least kill 10, after that you need to get on the helicopter to escape.

the amongus game is where you have to find the self-destruction code and blow up the ship, very bad so recommend not playing that but if only if you dare...(warning: laggy)

How to play:

Neb game:

use the WASD to move and SHIFT  to sprint. Left mouse click to shoot and right mouse to aim. 1 and 2 is switch between your guns. DONT GET TOUCH BY THE SLENDER NEBS!!!

amongus game:

why, but WASD to move and you have to find the note with the code and go in front of the ship where the pilot seats are and find the computer to self-destruction, if you managed to get that far then input the code and run and find the escape pod in time, good luck

THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR MY FRIENDS BIRTHDAY!! HAPPY B-DAY :)

Made by: Blockhead manic
